content: --करः {1} the sun; <ls>Śi. 11. 49</ls>; <ls>R. 11. 7</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 25</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 49.</ls> {2} a hero. {3} fire. {4} an epithet of Śiva. {5} <ab>N.</ab> of a celebrated Hindu astronomer who is said to have flourished in the eleventh or twelfth century <ab>A. D.</ab> (--रं gold.
